name: acrolinx-server-selector
description: A Container Component for Acrolinx Integrations that loads the Acrolinx sidebar

scripts.deploy: aws s3 cp tmp/dist s3://acrolinx-sidebar-classic/v14/dev --recursive --acl public-read
scripts.deployProd: aws s3 cp tmp/dist s3://acrolinx-sidebar-classic/v14/prod --recursive --acl public-read
scripts.buildDist: rm -rf tmp/dist && npm run tslint && tsc && npm run browserify && mkdir -p tmp && cp -r app tmp/dist && hashcat tmp/dist/index.html && npm run buildInlined && npm run fakeSidebarDist
scripts.buildInlined: rm -rf tmp/dist-inlined && cp -r app tmp/dist-inlined && hashcat tmp/dist-inlined/index-inlined.html && npm run inline && npm run packInlined
scripts.fakeSidebarDist: npm run bower && cat bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js bower_components/lodash/dist/lodash.min.js > tmp/dist/scripts/libs.js && cp tmp/dist/scripts/main.js tmp/dist/scripts/sidebar.js

author: Acrolinx
